title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
After a disappointing loss on Sunday night, Colin explains why it's time to downgrade the 49ers from "elite" status they were given after making a run to the Super Bowl a couple seasons ago. He shares the truth about Patrick Mahomes after the Chiefs fell to 3-4 and why it's okay to admit he's struggling right now despite his unbelievable talent. He tells you why he was right about Carson Wentz and wrong about the Lakers. Plus, NFL insider Mike Silver joins the show to give his thoughts on the Rams becoming Super Bowl contenders with Matthew Stafford and if Mike Tomlin would consider the USC job. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
